subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams needed eight match points to beat Johanna Larsson and give the United States an insurmountable 3-1 lead over Sweden in a Fed Cup World Group playoff in Delray Beach, Fla.
snippet: Venus Williams needed eight match points to beat Johanna Larsson and give the United States an insurmountable 3-1 lead over Sweden in a Fed Cup World Group playoff in Delray Beach, Fla.
